summary: Presently sponsored by: 1Password Extended Access Management: Secure every sign-in for every app on every device. summary: Welcome back to Here's Some Links.  I feel like I just did one of these, but the links keep coming so here we are again. title: Here's Some Links, Oct 5, 2024
